amendment.description: Manager's amendments consist of the text of the amendments contained in House Report 110-151 and printed on pages H5255-H5257 in the Congressional Record for May 16, 2007.
amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of the following amendments offered en bloc: Amendments nos. 2, 3, 6, 12, 13, 22, 23, 24, 25, 39, 44, 45, 46 printed in House Report 110-151.

action.text: On agreeing to the Skelton amendments (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
